plot: A short experimental film that tells a story of revenge completely in reverse. Mysteries unfold as the story's events rewind to their dark origins leaving the audience guessing until its end.
title: Verso
plot_es: A short experimental film that tells a story of revenge completely in reverse. Mysteries unfold as the story's events rewind to their dark origins leaving the audience guessing until its end.
